fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Competition, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Regional Policy, Public Health, Climate Action
head_office_address: Victoria Square House, 1st Floor Victoria Square
eu_initiatives: Environmental Directives that might have an impact on water bills of water and sewerage customers in England and Wales.
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
subsection: Other public or mixed entities, created by law whose purpose is to act in the public interest
goals__remit:
The Consumer Council for Water is the independent representative of household and business water consumers in England and Wales. The Consumer Council for Water is sponsored by Defra and the Welsh Government.  
 
Our remit is to make sure the consumers' voices are heard and acted upon in the water debates across England, Wales and Europe.
